        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ParticlePairHarmonicBond> getParticlePairBondMap()

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • isGaussianRandomDpdForce

        public boolean isGaussianRandomDpdForce()
        Flag for use of Gaussian random for random force
        Specified by:
        isGaussianRandomDpdForce in interface IInput
        Returns:
        True : Random DPD force is driven by random variable with Gaussian distribution with zero mean and unit variance (slower) False: Random DPD force is driven by random variable with uniform distribution with zero mean and unit variance (faster)

      • isDpdUnitMass

        public boolean isDpdUnitMass()
        Flag for use of DPD unit masses: True : DPD masses of all particles are set to 1 False: The DPD mass of the most lightweight particle (often water) is set to 1. The masses of all other particles are set in relation to their molar mass ratios to the most lightweight particle.
        Specified by:
        isDpdUnitMass in interface IInput
        Returns:
        Flag value for use of DPD unit masses

      • isVelocityScaling

        public boolean isVelocityScaling()
        True: Velocity scaling is performed for every simulation step, false: Otherwise
        Specified by:
        isVelocityScaling in interface IInput
        Returns:
        True: Velocity scaling is performed for every simulation step, false: Otherwise
